title: Bug 18285 - Double-clicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
description: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
OB: The expected behavior is that double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline should open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference, not on the target type.
EB: Build 20020528 In the package view outline, doubleclicking on a type import statement doesopen the editor on the target type, instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue causing the editor to open on the referenced type instead of the unit hosting the import reference when double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline.
